shadcn.import:
import { Command, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList } from '@/components/ui/command'
import { Popover, PopoverContent, PopoverTrigger } from '@/components/ui/popover'

notes: shadcn Combobox is composed from Command + Popover; vlting is a single integrated component
vlting takes options as a data array (ComboboxOption[]: { value, label }); shadcn uses declarative children
Built-in search filtering, keyboard navigation (ArrowUp/Down, Enter, Escape)
Sets role='combobox', aria-expanded, and aria-haspopup='listbox' for accessibility
Dropdown options use role='option' and aria-selected

breaking.reason: Integrated API; no manual composition needed
